column4: On my gnome desktop I have an folder icon pointing to my home dir, complete with a cute little house in the lower rh corner.  The context menu has 'delete'  and 'move to trash' greyed out.  How do I remove it?
sudo rm Samples (i think that's the name of the dir).. it's actually just a symlink to another dir.. so you'll just get it out of your home folder with that
wait.. i misread your post.. dont delete your home dir :)
